snippet: A study shows the same sorry outcome for hundreds of complaints against agents who abused migrants: inaction or a lack of a resolution.
abstract: Editorial cites American Immigration Council study that found complaints about Border Patrol agents rarely lead to any sort of action or resolution; contends report offers blueprint for action for the Customs and Border Protection agency, which lacks transparency and accountability.
lead_paragraph: A study shows the same sorry outcome for hundreds of complaints against agents who abused migrants: inaction or a lack of a resolution.
